label: 高陽院行幸駒競絵詞
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
見出し読み: かやのいんぎょうこうこまくれべえことば
説明文: A scroll painging of scenes of An Imperial Visit to the Horse Races."  The work is thought to date from the late thirteenth or early fourteenth century."
